name: Jebus Crusts Game of Wits!
description:
I Hope this works!

Made by Jebus Crust,

and Albino Bear

a simple sports game which has four sports: 1: Boxing 2: Football 3: Bird 4: Bowling Controls: Boxing: punch left: arrow key up punch right: W move Left: arrow key left move right: arrow key right Football: Player 1: Move Up: W Move Left: A Move Right: D Move Down: S Player 2: Move Up: arrow key up Move Left: arrow key left Move Right: arrow key right Move Down: arrow key down Bowling: move right: arrow key right move left: arrow key left bowl: space Bird: Move Up: arrow key up Move Left: arrow key left Move Right: arrow key right Move Down: arrow key down Flap: space
